circuit.explanation: Write the name of the court circuit handling your case (like 'First Circuit').

division.explanation: Write the specific court division (like 'Honolulu', 'Maui', etc.).

civil_number.explanation: Write your case number. You can find this on your court paperwork.

plaintiffs.explanation: Write the name(s) of the person or people who started the case.

defendants.explanation: Write the name(s) of the person or people being sued.

filing_party_info.explanation: Write your name and contact information. If you have a lawyer, write their name and contact info instead.

pro_bono_attorney_checkbox.explanation: Check this box if the attorney is working for free (pro bono). Leave it blank if it doesn’t apply.

is_employed.explanation: Write 'Yes' if you are working, or 'No' if you are not currently employed.

monthly_income.explanation: Write the total amount of money you earn each month from your job.

employer_name_and_address.explanation: Write the name and address of your current or most recent employer.

date_last_employed.explanation: If you’re not working now, write the last date you had a job.

housing_status.explanation: Write 'Rent' or 'Own' to show if you rent or own your home.

monthly_housing_payment.explanation: Write the amount you pay each month for rent or a mortgage.

receives_rent_assistance.explanation: Write 'Yes' if you get help paying your rent (like Section 8), or 'No' if you do not.

owns_other_real_estate.explanation: Write 'Yes' if you own any property other than your home. Write 'No' if you don’t.

other_real_estate_value.explanation: If you said 'Yes' above, write the total value of that other property.

has_bank_account.explanation: Write 'Yes' if you have money in any bank account. Write 'No' if you don’t.

bank_account_total.explanation: If you said 'Yes', write the total amount of money in all your accounts.

owns_vehicle.explanation: Write 'Yes' if you own any cars or trucks. Write 'No' if you do not.

receives_assistance.explanation: Check all that apply to you: Social Security (SSI or SSDI), SNAP, TANF, Food Stamps, etc.

dependents.explanation: List anyone you support financially (like children or relatives). Say who they are and how much you give to support them.

other_income_sources.explanation: If you get any other money not listed above, explain what it is (like side jobs, gifts, etc.).

declaration_signature_date.explanation: Write the date you are signing this form.

declaration_signature.explanation: Sign your name to confirm everything you wrote is true.

declaration_name.explanation: Print or type your full name under your signature.

court_order_result.explanation: This section is for the judge. They will check either 'Granted' (fees waived) or 'Denied' (you must pay the fees).

judge_signature_date.explanation: Date the judge signs this form (you do not fill this out).
